sections.heading: Strategic plan on improving access to inpatient psychiatric beds
sections.text: The Department of Human Services' Division of Mental Health shall develop a written, strategic plan that comprehensively addresses improving access to inpatient psychiatric beds in State-operated mental health facilities for individ

sections.heading: Implementation.   The strategic plan developed by the Division of Mental Health shall be finalized and made publicly available one year after the effective date of this Act
Prohibition on reduction of State-operated psychiatric inpatient beds
sections.text:
The Department shall make no further reductions in State-operated inpatient mental health bed capacity. Nothing in
this Section shall affect the authority of the Governor to
issue emergency executive orders to protect the health or
safety of recipients or employees of State-operated inpatient psychiatric facilities.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
